Subjects: prayers, to Christ; sermons, verse in
_description: Prayer in a passion sermon on Amore Langueo (possibly by Bromyard) for dominica in passione vel in die parasceue — 2 couplets

CULKk424.Transcription:
Lord y blessyd be þy namefor me þu suffredust despyte &
                    schameAs þu art ful of graceþe to serue ȝyf me
